content: off but do not cut the yarn to bind off pull a loop through the second to last bar and the loop on the hook repeat across one loop remains on the hook top of the hat top row 1 forward pass rotate the work to work along what was the left side of the work counting the loop on the hook at your first stitch do a forward pass across the now top edge for 21 20 22 stitches only use the edge stitch of each row to pull a loop through since you do not have a previous forward pass to use 21 20 22 stitches on the hook only covers 1/4 the length of the original 84 80 88 row you are making the top of the hat as a square that will be seamed once completed top row 1 return pass cut the other color and join it on the left side where the hook is use it to do your first return pass on the top of the hat top row 2-21 20 22 continuing with the same color scheme as the sides complete 20 19 21 more forward and return passes ending with the return pass of row 21 20 22 top bind-off row bind off see bind-off after row 84 80 88 seam up the hat folding the top down and seaming it on three sides and seaming the cast-on and row-84 80 88 bind off ends together for the seams use slipstitch in one of the colors a snug whipstitch in the same yarn or a fancy vandyke stitch you might want to also stitch across the base of the first top row so the stitching goes around the whole top of the hat further adventures you will find many youtube videos on tunisian crochet showing various stitches and items made remember to give yourself time when you approach a new technique or stitch the yarn you use as you develop your skills is well worth the knowledge it provides for more information on me and my workshops see my website www thebellwether com i d be happy to come and teach your group available topics and rates are also available on my website thank you © 2016 amelia garripoli askthebellwether blogspot com all rights reserved thank you for your support of the arts 2
